duties_responsibilities.duty: Process invoices, packing slips, and freight claims, and track inventories in storage.
Resolve invoice discrepancies and ensure timely processing of production materials.
Handle shipping and handling of hazardous materials, prepare outgoing shipment requests, schedule pickups, and label incoming materials.
Stand for extended periods of time, perform frequent repetitive movements, bending, frequent lifting, pulling, and pushing motions, and handle cold items frequently in temperature conditions.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent; valid driver’s license; previous experience handling and storing hazardous materials is preferred.
